name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 14, Hunan. A blind path was occupied by a lamp post, and a national flag was hung on the post. The photographer said that blind people passing by here might be hit and bleed. How is the municipal engineering designed?
One netizen replied: "Are you not patriotic?" "It's worth falling under the national flag"
Another netizen said that blind people are unlikely to hit the post with a cane. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj1xv7KbsAA1reh.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Gansu. A woman said that her parents died when she was young, and she started from scratch to establish 4 companies and paid over 100 million yuan in taxes, which helped local villagers get rich. She also donated to the society. However, she was persecuted by local officials and imprisoned. The company's assets were also sold at a low price by the government, causing the company to go bankrupt. The woman said: Don't private enterprises deserve to survive? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890796561623662593/pu/img/SIbq4QZ_sq2IOmIz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Shangrao, Jiangxi. Veteran Zhang Tianjian said that he participated in the nuclear test and risked his life to rush into the nuclear explosion area to record data. He dedicated his youth to China's nuclear industry. However, he is now weak and sick. Because he did not give gifts or money, he has not been assessed as disabled and cannot receive pension. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj2AEY8acAAlsU2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Shandong. A man stole the food from the delivery boy's car, and the boy chased the man all the way to catch him. The man knelt down to apologize to the delivery boy, saying that he had not found a job, had been hungry for two days, and his phone was out of battery. The delivery boy said that it was not easy for him to deliver food. Finally, under the plea of passers-by, the delivery boy let the man go. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890840339789090816/pu/img/5pa3dC1Ggk0nkpdx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 15, the annual Xi'an Chang'an Lingzhao Feng Village Tiger Shooting (Community Fire) was spontaneously held under the strong push of the majority of villagers. Previously, on the 12th, the local government issued a notice prohibiting the holding of this year's Tiger Shooting in the name of narrow roads, which aroused the dissatisfaction of the villagers. The villagers posted the relevant videos online and called on the people around Xi'an to come and watch the performance.
On the 15th, the villagers announced that they would spontaneously organize a community fire parade. It is said that there were about 70,000 to 80,000 people on the scene that day. On the day of the event, the local public security arranged a large number of police officers to go to the scene to maintain order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplement: On February 14, the old man held up a banner and questioned the police, who retreated repeatedly.
A large number of villagers gathered in front of the village committee to negotiate with relevant personnel and succeeded, and the scene was full of jubilation https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890846388147085313/pu/img/MjRoeP_wVUnAnLcz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video version: Ukrainian President Zelensky delivered a speech at the Munich Security Conference, saying that in the face of continued threats from Russia and uncertainty about US support, Europe must rely on itself for defense. He called for Europe to have its own armed forces. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890866759332241408/pu/img/gSn1TS-HalL8Olp7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A family member of a kidnapped victim of telecom fraud asked for help on Xiaohongshu:
Phase 4 of the Baolong Park in Poipet, Cambodia, is full of Chinese people. A Chinese was beaten to death during the Chinese New Year on February 2.
The Cambodian government sent military police to investigate, but they rescued the Koreans and not a single Chinese. I hope the country can rescue the Chinese people inside. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj3FgHqXAAAlDVZ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of now, there has been no follow-up to the explosion at the Dadong Non-staple Food Market in Shenyang.
On February 10, a blogger uploaded a video of visiting the Shenyang Dadong Non-staple Food Mall. From the video, it can be seen that the entrance of the mall has been restored to its original state, as if the explosion had never happened. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890901188582703104/pu/img/DvQU8pEM0tdEksff.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Republican Senator Graham: "We must ensure that we are deeply integrated economically with Ukraine to make it a cordon sanitaire. If we reach a mineral agreement with American companies in Ukraine, it will become more difficult to invade. At the same time, we need to continue to enhance the combat effectiveness of the Ukrainian army, arm them to the teeth, give them a batch of F-16 fighter jets, and make any future invasion extremely difficult. This is a deterrent in itself. If Ukraine cannot join NATO now, my idea with Boris Johnson is to send a very clear message - tell Putin that if he invades Ukraine again, it will trigger Ukraine's automatic joining of NATO and become another cordon sanitaire. As long as we do these three things, he will not launch an invasion again. Otherwise, we will be back to square one and repeat the same mistakes."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Shanghai. The woman filmed a street in Xuhui District. More than a dozen shops along the street were closed. Some shops were open, but their business was not satisfactory. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890992232507002880/pu/img/Y1cvahJt-t7YweiY.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
US President Trump posted a message today claiming that "those who save the country do not break any laws."
This sentence comes from Napoleon, the military and political leader who ruled France in the 19th century. Napoleon enacted the "Napoleonic Code" in 1804 and then proclaimed himself emperor.
The Democratic camp quickly criticized Trump. California Senator Adam Schiff wrote on the social platform X: "The tone is no different from a real dictator." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj5WTE9aQAAmopQ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15 (Released) A BYD anchor flipped over while demonstrating the automatic parking function of BYD Ocean to the audience in the live broadcast room, and it is suspected that it collided with other vehicles. It is reported that the car is equipped with the "Eye of God" intelligent driving system. Netizens joked: "Is God blind?" "Why didn't God open his eyes?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891049123601846272/pu/img/rqj0M-38pLOOe_gt.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many netizens gave Captain America 4 a one-star bad review in order to support the domestic film Nezha 2. The netizens who gave bad reviews said: "Love China, dear compatriots"
"Whoever watches Captain America will get sick"
"I want Captain America to die in China!" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj5dX9laUAAv-IS.jpg
